channel.title: Ruohong Wang on Shen Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ruohong Wang on Shen Blog

item.title: Metabolic Reaction Network-based Recursive Metabolite Annotation for Untargeted Metabolomics
item.description: Here, we develop a metabolic reaction network (MRN)-based recursive algorithm (MetDNA) that expands metabolite annotations without the need for a comprehensive standard spectral library.
